SPORECASH!

  • Auto-staking: Earn SPORECASH with zero fees.
  • Referral strategy: Refer and earn $BNB
  • Fair launch: 90% of funds raised will be added to liquidity
  • Super safe: Liquidity is burned.
  • Launching time: As soon as presale ends.

SPORECASH PROTOCOL

By holding SPORECASH in your wallet, you could earn more profit.
In each transaction, the protocol automatically distributes the rewards to the holders, as well as the liquidity that is automatically burned.

SPORECASH LAUNCH

It will be released on Pancakeswap as soon as presale ends.
Remember to generate your referral link and you will earn 50% BNB for each purchase made by your referrals, THE MORE YOU SHARE THE MORE YOU EARN!

Tokenomics

Total Supply: 100,000,000,000,000,000

Roadmap

Sporecash plans to be more than just a buyback token. Take a look at our plans for the upcoming weeks and months, and stay tuned for a few upcoming surprise announcements in our Telegram regarding utility and use-cases:

1

Launch Phase

September 2021

Our team has been preparing for a successful presale of Sporecash, and we've successfully gotten our modified fork developed and tested! Now our next step is building our core community and launching Sporecash. All information pertaining to this will be posted in our Telegram.

2

Building Phase

October 2021

A month is a long time in the crypto space. So during this month, our team plans to get a lot done. Most notably we'll get Sporecash trading on some exchanges during this time! We will also be listed on CoinGecko/CoinMarketCap by this stage.

3

Expanding Phase

November 2021

By now we will have built up a strong and passionate community around Sporecash. During this month, we plan on producing our own merchandise, fully releasing our Sporecash dApp, and also doing a major marketing push in order to keep the spark alive for Sporecash over the coming fall season.

4

Mooning Phase

December 2021

When we get here, we'll release an updated roadmap with our team and community's refreshed goals and visions for the project and Sporecash dApp. By now, we will have hoped to surpass all other memecoins around us and to have built up one of the strongest communities in crypto!
